casebody.data:
Barbara J. MROZ, as personal representative of the Estate of Richard Carl Mroz, Sr., Appellant,
v.
Ann MROZ; Barbara J. Mroz; Individually and as trustee of the Richard C. Mroz Revocable Trust of 1994; Janet M. Cooper; Kathleen M. Bacon; Richard C. Mroz, Jr.; Melanie A. Constantino; and Laurie M. Beck, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-112 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed November 15, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
